Go hiking!

Hiking Is Healthy

Is it ever! While there is a growing amount of hiking-specific research, studies of the benefits of walking are equally applicable to hiking. According to the American Hiking Society, hiking delivers a remarkable range of health benefits with comparatively few risks. By using hiking as a way to stay physically active, you can potentially lose weight, reduce heart disease, decrease hypertension, and slow the aging process. It also offers mental health benefits by reducing stress and anxiety.
